citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
There is a written program of veterinary care but the last site visit documented by the veterinarian has been over a
year ago on October 1, 2010. Regular inspections by attending veterinarians are required in order to ensure
adequate veterinary care at the facility. The licensee shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal
arrangements and must schedule regular visits to the premises.
To be corrected by October 20, 2014.
Exit interview conducted with licensee.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).

arrangements and must schedule regular visits to the premises. 
To be corrected by October 20, 2014. 
Exit interview conducted with licensee.
